alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:20PM EST until January 09 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST FOR EASTERN CHESTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES... At 219 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Indian Land to 10 miles north of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lesslie, Great Falls, Fort Lawn, Richburg, Catawba, Edgemoor, Fishing Creek Reservoir, and Blackstock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for Upstate South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
